author: bluk
msg: Remove default XmlFormattingOptions
This will give (by default) no indention
which will give faster performance on
Atom documents without the indenting.
It also will help during the lookup
of ContextResolvers which is not
a cheap operation.
Thanks Doug for taking a profile.
See [WINK-202]

author: bluk
msg: Remove service doc from default XmlFormattingOptions
See [WINK-202]

author: bluk
msg: Change XmlFormattingOptions to use properties
See [WINK-202]

author: bluk
msg: Change ProvidersRegistry to use SoftConcurrentMap
The performance difference between the SoftConcurrentMap
and ConcurrentHashMap seems negligible after the
removal of the locks in SoftConcurrentMap and
I would like to use the same caching mechanisms.
Thanks to Doug Larson for taking the profile.

author: bluk
msg: Removed reader/writer locks from ProvidersRegistry
No need for locks for MediaTypeMap since
data and entry is already volatile and synchronized.
Also added isEmptyMap boolean for ContextResolvers
which shows a small 1% performance improvement
if the ContextResolver map is empty.
